message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $100 to you, and we're looking to maximize our earnings. Let's start with an offer of $95 for the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $85.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. To continue our negotiation, we propose a price of $90 for the product.
Thank you for your proposal, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to suggest a price of $87 for the product.
We appreciate your continued interest, Bob. Our latest offer for the product is $89. We hope this aligns better with your budget.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $88.
We understand your position, Bob. Our final offer for the product is $88.50. This is our highest bid, considering the value it holds for us as well.
